GENERAL.game_disabled.player.en_US: &cThe [game] game is currently disabled for you!
GENERAL.game_disabled.player.en_GB: &cThe [game] game is currently disabled for you!

JUMPANDRUN.reached_highscore.en_US: &aYou've cracked your high score! &7Let's see how far you can get...
JUMPANDRUN.reached_highscore.en_GB: &aYou've cracked your high score! &7Let's see how far you can get...
JUMPANDRUN.reached_highscore.en_XX: &aVerily, thou hast shattered thy highest tally! &7Let us witness how far thou canst journey...
JUMPANDRUN.reached_highscore.de_DE: &aDu hast deinen Highscore geknackt! &7Mal sehen, wie weit du noch kommst...
JUMPANDRUN.reached_highscore.de_AT: &aDu hast dei Highscore g'knaust! &7Schau ma mal, wie weit du no kimmst...
JUMPANDRUN.reached_highscore.de_XX: &aDu hascht deinen Heighschkore zerhackt! &7Mal sehn, wie weit no kommst...

JUMPANDRUN.started.infinite.en_US: &7The Jump and Run has been &astarted &7in the <#F99D19>infinite mode&7. Use &e<|jnr leave> &7to leave the game.
JUMPANDRUN.started.infinite.en_GB: &7The Jump and Run has been &astarted &7in the <#F99D19>infinite mode&7. Use &e<|jnr leave> &7to leave the game.
JUMPANDRUN.started.infinite.de_DE: &7Das Jump and Run wurde im <#F99D19>unendlichen Modus &agestartet&7. Benutze &e<|jnr leave>&7, um das Spiel zu verlassen.

JUMPANDRUN.started.normal.en_US: &7The Jump and Run has been &astarted &7in the <#FCF442>normal mode&7. Use &e<|jnr infinite> &7to switch to infinite mode.
JUMPANDRUN.started.normal.en_GB: &7The Jump and Run has been &astarted &7in the <#FCF442>normal mode&7. Use &e<|jnr infinite> &7to switch to infinite mode.
JUMPANDRUN.started.normal.de_DE: &7Das Jump and Run wurde im <#FCF442>normalen Modus &agestartet&7. Benutze &e<|jnr infinite>&7, um zum unendlichen Modus zu wechseln.

JUMPANDRUN.you_left.de_DE: &cDu hast das Spiel verlassen! &7Du hast &e[jumps] &7Sprünge geschafft.

JUMPANDRUN.you_fell_down.infinite.en_US: &cYou fell down! &7You've made &e[jumps] &7jumps. &6Your jumps have been reset to 0.
JUMPANDRUN.you_fell_down.infinite.en_GB: &cYou fell down! &7You've made &e[jumps] &7jumps. &6Your jumps have been reset to 0.
JUMPANDRUN.you_fell_down.infinite.en_XX: &cIn sooth, thou hast fallen too far! &7Thou hast made thee &e[jumps] &7jumps. &6Your jumps have been reset to 0.
JUMPANDRUN.you_fell_down.infinite.de_DE: &cDu bist runtergefallen! &7Du hast &e[jumps] &7Sprünge geschafft. &6Deine Sprünge wurden auf 0 zurückgesetzt.
JUMPANDRUN.you_fell_down.infinite.de_AT: &cDu bist runter'gfallen! &7Du host &e[jumps] &7Sprünge g'schafft. &6Deine Sprünge wurden auf 0 zurückgesetzt.
JUMPANDRUN.you_fell_down.infinite.de_XX: &cDu bischt z'weit gfalla! &e[jumps] &7Sprünge hast gschafft. &6Deine Sprünge wurden auf 0 zurückgesetzt.

JUMPANDRUN.you_fell_down.normal.en_XX: &cIn sooth, thou hast fallen too far! &7Thou hast made thee &e[jumps] &7jumps.

JUMPANDRUN.too_far_away.en_XX: &cIn sooth, thou hast strayed too far! &7Thou hast made thee &e[jumps] &7jumps.
JUMPANDRUN.too_far_away.de_DE: &cDu bist zu weit weg! &7Du hast &e[jumps] &7Sprünge geschafft.

JUMPANDRUN.not_playing.en_US: &cYou are not in a Jump and Run right now!
JUMPANDRUN.not_playing.en_GB: &cYou are not in a Jump and Run right now!
JUMPANDRUN.not_playing.de_DE: &cDu befindest dich gerade in keinem Jump and Run!

JUMPANDRUN.already_playing.en_US: &cYou are already in a Jump and Run!
JUMPANDRUN.already_playing.en_GB: &cYou are already in a Jump and Run!
JUMPANDRUN.already_playing.de_DE: &cDu bist bereits in einem Jump and Run!

JUMPANDRUN.mode_switch.infinite.en_US: &7You switched your mode to the <#F99D19>infinite mode&7! Use &e<|jnr leave> &7to leave the game.
JUMPANDRUN.mode_switch.infinite.en_GB: &7You switched your mode to the <#F99D19>infinite mode&7! Use &e<|jnr leave> &7to leave the game.
JUMPANDRUN.mode_switch.infinite.de_DE: &7Du hast deinen Modus zum <#F99D19>unendlichen Modus &7gewechselt! Use &e<|jnr leave> &7to leave the game.

JUMPANDRUN.mode_switch.normal.en_US: &7You switched your mode to the <#FCF442>normal mode&7!
JUMPANDRUN.mode_switch.normal.en_GB: &7You switched your mode to the <#FCF442>normal mode&7!
